application

Class NewUserScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Screen
      • application.NewUserScreen

  • public class NewUserScreen
extends Screen
    The window for creating a new user. This class builds the javafx that makes up this screen.
    Author:
    Gideon Davies., Andy Kuo
